ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] reason for guise of the deceiver to come off?
ygData.msgSnippet: For anyone that knows what drops where , I have one question I hope you could answer :) I have been in the zone for days looking for this thing, originally i
ygData.messageBody:
For anyone that knows what drops where , I have one question I hope you could
answer :)

I have been in the zone for days looking for this thing, originally i heard
it was a roaming non static spawn , so i just ran around killing some things
, and also hoping that other groups hunting there might cause it to spawn.

But , now it seems its static .

So my questions are ( if you can answer them )

1) is it a roamer or a static? , just looking for a confirmation on this one.

2) this one I hope you'll answer hehe. Not looking for a name or specific
location , but in my search ( solo ) , this would help a lot. There is a
kind of zone divider on one side is frogs and mantraps and other such stuff ,
and then there is that gate , and the spectral / treasure hunter side . could
you possibly say which side its on , in either case there is still a ton on
either side. but it would really help. I wanna find this sucker on my own ,
but its getting old hehe.

If you don't want to answer this on the list you can email me privately at
kevikazzam@...

I don't think it gives away too much , and would be a great help to me
In anycase thanks for your time.

Ulaien Firesong
lvl 51 bard of Trakanon .....errr....Tunare :)
